data.text:
@ThomasT44428533 Thank you, Comrade.

Keep blowing Putin and Trump

@AmaranoTony If Trump is your idea of a President...

that speaks volumes about you.

@PaulFox50854324 You trust Joe Biden you want to Satan's Little Helpers may God have mercy on your soul when a new comes up blows up your ass inner probably be Joe blowing us all up in self he be hitting all the wrong button you are an idiot I'm glad you got to live with it

@PaulFox50854324 Careful Paul. Your lived experience may be markedly different from that of other people who voted for Joe and were hoping for more real and tangible help from the government we all finance, and some have served. 
That doesn't make them, doesn't make US, stupid whiners.
